title: Walker's Paradise, Vintage Building & Laundry On-Site - 2 Weeks Free
posting_body: Large Studio 2 Blocks from King Street Station - 2 Weeks Free Rent!
Governor Apartments - Seattle Property Management Associates
The Governor is located in the heart of the International District offering a walk score of 98!
This is ideal for easy access to Metro/Sound Transit/Light Rail, and all that Downtown Seattle has to offer.
This is a beautiful studio, with hard to find amenities in a Seattle studio apartment.
The Governor Building is a well maintained historic building, with amazing architectural details.
Located just one block from the International District Station, serving Link Light Rail, Sound Transit, King County Metro, Seattle Streetcar.
Just 2 blocks from King Street Station, serving Amtrak, and Sounder Commuter trains.
With-in walking distance of Lumen Field/Event Center, and T-Mobile Park.
At the time of application, we require payment of the $25 application fee per person and a $1000 deposit that is then applied to the refundable security deposit upon approval.
This building is no smoking and no dogs- cats are allowed.
There is a $50 utility fee for water, sewer, and garbage.
For more information or to schedule a showing, please contact Josh
